text: Nicola Sanna (born 4 May 1963 in Bochum) is an Italian politician. He is a member of the Democratic Party and he was elected Mayor of Sassari on 25 May 2014 and took his office on 31 May. ==References== ==See also== *2014 Italian local elections *List of mayors of Sassari ==External links== * * Category:1963 births Category:Living people Category:Mayors of Sassari Category:Democratic Party (Italy) politicians
title: Nicola Sanna
